exercises.title: Playing in the Playground
exercises.question: Where is the boy playing?
exercises.transcript: The boy plays in the playground.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The boy is playing in the playground.

exercises.title: Drinking Hot Tea
exercises.question: What does the speaker like to drink?
exercises.transcript: I like to drink hot tea.
exercises.sampleAnswer: I like to drink hot tea.

exercises.title: Wearing Blue Shirt and Pants
exercises.question: What is he wearing?
exercises.transcript: He is wearing a blue shirt and pants.
exercises.sampleAnswer: He is wearing a blue shirt and pants.

exercises.title: Writing a Letter
exercises.question: Who does she write a letter to?
exercises.transcript: She writes a letter to her best friend.
exercises.sampleAnswer: She writes a letter to her best friend.

exercises.title: Going to the Temple
exercises.question: Where are they going?
exercises.transcript: They are going to the temple.
exercises.sampleAnswer: They are going to the temple.

exercises.title: Doctor's Advice
exercises.question: What does the doctor advise the patient?
exercises.transcript: The doctor advises the patient to take proper rest.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The doctor advises the patient to take proper rest.

exercises.title: Old Man Sitting Quietly
exercises.question: Where does the old man sit?
exercises.transcript: The old man sits quietly under the tree.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The old man sits quietly under the tree.

exercises.title: Train Arriving on Time
exercises.question: When does the train arrive at the station?
exercises.transcript: The train arrives at the station on time.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The train arrives at the station on time.

exercises.title: Reading Before Sleeping
exercises.question: What does the speaker do before going to sleep?
exercises.transcript: I read a book before going to sleep.
exercises.sampleAnswer: I read a book before going to sleep.

exercises.title: Watching a Movie
exercises.question: What are they watching in the theater?
exercises.transcript: They are watching a movie in the theater.

exercises.title: Crying Baby
exercises.question: Why is the baby crying?
exercises.transcript: The baby is crying because he lost his toy.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The baby is crying because he lost his toy.

exercises.title: Uncle’s Travels
exercises.question: Where does my uncle travel for work?
exercises.transcript: My uncle travels to different cities for work.
exercises.sampleAnswer: My uncle travels to different cities for work.

exercises.title: Airplane Takes Off
exercises.question: When does the airplane take off?
exercises.transcript: The airplane takes off early in the morning.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The airplane takes off early in the morning.

exercises.title: Old Man Sitting Quietly Again
exercises.question: Where does the old man sit?
exercises.transcript: The old man sits quietly under the big tree.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The old man sits quietly under the big tree.

exercises.title: Walking to School
exercises.question: When do we walk to school?
exercises.transcript: We walk to school every morning at eight.
exercises.sampleAnswer: We walk to school every morning at eight.

exercises.title: Train Arrives on Time
exercises.question: When does the train arrive at the station?
exercises.transcript: The train arrives at the station on time.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The train arrives at the station on time.

exercises.title: Morning Sunshine
exercises.question: What is shining bright in the morning?
exercises.transcript: The sun is shining bright in the morning.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The sun is shining bright in the morning.

exercises.title: Buying Fresh Vegetables
exercises.question: Where does she buy fresh vegetables?
exercises.transcript: She buys fresh vegetables from the local market.
exercises.sampleAnswer: She buys fresh vegetables from the local market.

exercises.title: Teacher Writing on Blackboard
exercises.question: What does the teacher write on the blackboard?
exercises.transcript: The teacher writes new words on the blackboard.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The teacher writes new words on the blackboard.

exercises.title: Grandmother’s Stories
exercises.question: Who tells stories before you sleep?
exercises.transcript: My grandmother tells me stories before I sleep.
exercises.sampleAnswer: My grandmother tells me stories before I sleep.

exercises.title: Enjoyable Train Journey
exercises.question: How was the train journey?
exercises.transcript: The train journey was long but very enjoyable.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The train journey was long but very enjoyable.

exercises.title: River Flowing Between Mountains
exercises.question: Where does the river flow?
exercises.transcript: The river flows calmly between the two mountains.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The river flows calmly between the two mountains.

exercises.title: Cat Sleeping Under Blanket
exercises.question: Where does the cat sleep?
exercises.transcript: The cat sleeps under the warm soft blanket.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The cat sleeps under the warm soft blanket.

exercises.title: Mother Cooking Delicious Food
exercises.question: Who cooks delicious food for you?
exercises.transcript: My mother cooks delicious food for us.
exercises.sampleAnswer: My mother cooks delicious food for us.

exercises.title: Eating Dinner Together
exercises.question: Where do we eat dinner together?
exercises.transcript: We eat dinner together at the diner.
exercises.sampleAnswer: We eat dinner together at the diner.

exercises.title: Farmer Growing Rice
exercises.question: What does the farmer grow in his field?
exercises.transcript: The farmer grows rice in his large green field.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The farmer grows rice in his large green field.

exercises.title: Celebrating Festivals
exercises.question: With whom do I celebrate festivals?
exercises.transcript: I celebrate festivals with my family and friends.
exercises.sampleAnswer: I celebrate festivals with my family and friends.

exercises.title: Shopkeeper Selling Fresh Items
exercises.question: What does the shopkeeper sell?

exercises.sampleAnswer: The shopkeeper sells fresh fruits, milk, and eggs.

exercises.title: Football Players Practicing
exercises.question: Where do football players practice every day?
exercises.transcript: The football players practice every day in the stadium.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The football players practice every day in the stadium.

exercises.title: Buying a New Dress
exercises.question: Where did she buy a new dress?
exercises.transcript: She brought a new dress from the new shop.
exercises.sampleAnswer: She brought a new dress from the new shop.

exercises.title: Brushing Teeth
exercises.question: When does she brush her teeth?
exercises.transcript: She brushes her teeth after eating every meal.
exercises.sampleAnswer: She brushes her teeth after eating every meal.

exercises.title: Children Playing Football
exercises.question: Where do the children play football?

exercises.question: What does the farmer grow in his field?
exercises.transcript: The farmer grows rice in his large green field.

exercises.title: Celebrating Festivals
exercises.question: Who do we celebrate festivals with?
exercises.transcript: We celebrate festivals with family and many friends.

exercises.title: Enjoying Reading Books
exercises.question: What kind of books does she enjoy reading?

exercises.question: How does the teacher explain difficult topics?
exercises.transcript: The teacher explains difficult topics with easy examples.

exercises.title: Carpenter Building Furniture
exercises.question: What does the carpenter build?

exercises.title: Placing Flowers in a Vase
exercises.question: Where does he place the flowers?
exercises.transcript: He carefully places the flowers in a beautiful vase.
exercises.sampleAnswer: He carefully places the flowers in a beautiful vase.

exercises.title: Grandmother Baking Cakes
exercises.question: What does my grandmother bake for my birthday?
exercises.transcript: My grandmother bakes delicious cakes for my birthday.
exercises.sampleAnswer: My grandmother bakes delicious cakes for my birthday.

exercises.title: Completing Homework
exercises.question: What did I complete before watching TV?
exercises.transcript: I completed my homework before watching TV.
exercises.sampleAnswer: I completed my homework before watching TV.

exercises.title: Festivals Bringing Joy
exercises.question: What does the festival bring?
exercises.transcript: The festival brings happiness and joy to everyone.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The festival brings happiness and joy to everyone.

exercises.title: Students Studying for Exams
exercises.question: What did the students work hard for?
exercises.transcript: The students worked so hard for their exams.
exercises.sampleAnswer: The students worked so hard for their exams.

exercises.title: Playing with Puppy
exercises.question: Where do I like to play with my puppy?
exercises.transcript: I like to play with my little puppy in the garden.
exercises.sampleAnswer: I like to play with my little puppy in the garden.

exercises.title: Reading Before Exams
exercises.question: What do I do before going for the exams?
exercises.transcript: I read the books before going for the exams.
exercises.sampleAnswer: I read the books before going for the exams.

exercises.title: Riding a Bike Carefully
exercises.question: How does he ride the bike?
exercises.transcript: He rides the bike carefully and follows all the traffic rules.
